channel.title: Are you hot.....or not?
channel.description:
i found this website : www.hotornot.com so, register and find out how hot you are. Then post your Score and the one that has the best score shall be the hottest of moparisthebest forums :D
Good luck... ;)
EDIT: People who registered:
Blackester - http://www.hotornot.com/r/?eid=AZSYHYH&key=TGV therealjdb - http://www.hotornot.com/r/?eid=AZSYEUS&key=UQG S!ms - http://www.hotornot.com/r/?eid=AZSSRMK-LMX Itachi Uchiha - http://www.hotornot.com/r/?eid=AZSRKSS&key=JHD

item.title: Are you hot.....or not?
item.dc:creator: @g00dg0d g00dg0d
item.description:
@g00dg0d wrote:

[quote author=xThe manx link=topic=57280.msg715540#msg715540 date=1167605852]

[quote=“S!ms, post:82, topic:40863”]How not his real msn
BOOM - headshot![/quote]

It was you saying that that started it… I also dont care if someone is a junior member or a CM. Its pretty obvious that Mr. Chris was only trying to prove that people can lie over the internet but then you said this and pissed everyone off:

[quote=“xThe manx, post:96, topic:40863”][quote author=Mr.Chris link=topic=57280.msg715778#msg715778 date=1167609442]
Lel - You obviously do. Hey, I bet you’ve only seen a pussy in porn

People who talk talk in the internet, are 90% lying.

Guess what, I fuck a girl every day, I also take cocaine, and I’ve also raped a man…

ah i get it now : you never fucked a girl , you dont take cocaine and you never raped a man…i get it now , you’re a pathetic horny nerd who lies and pretends to be a girl on the internet to see some dick

not all people who talk in the internet lie.take for an example me :
i’ve been here a few months and i never lied about anything here on moparisthebest.com

And no , i dont play rs[/quote]

But lets just stop the spam ok…

Damn stupid quotes… oh well Im not gunna fix it.

Read full topic

item.title: Are you hot.....or not?

item.description:
@Falko222 wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:97, topic:40863”][quote author=xThe manx link=topic=57280.msg716058#msg716058 date=1167614016]

Lel - You obviously do. Hey, I bet you’ve only seen a pussy in porn

People who talk talk in the internet, are 90% lying.

Guess what, I fuck a girl every day, I also take cocaine, and I’ve also raped a man…

ah i get it now : you never fucked a girl , you dont take cocaine and you never raped a man…i get it now , you’re a pathetic horny nerd who lies and pretends to be a girl on the internet to see some dick

not all people who talk in the internet lie.take for an example me :
i’ve been here a few months and i never lied about anything here on moparisthebest.com

And no , i dont play rs
[/quote]

Ok, ok, ok. Lets set a few things straight. If you weren’t such a stupid prick, you would of noticed I was joking about the whole girl thing.

Prove to me you have never lied about anything please? It’s the internet, people lie about everything. Whether you thinks it’s true or not, it will be extremely difficult/weird/perverted/illegal to find out.[/quote]

You joked about the girl thing, yet you didnt denie raping a man…Very interesting
